{# errorcheck #} {%% m := map[string]interface{}{"a":6} _ = &m // this is valid _ = &m.a // ERROR `cannot take the address of m.a` _ = &(m.a) // ERROR `cannot take the address of m.a` _ = (&m).a // ERROR `&m.a undefined (type *map[string]interface {} has no field or method a)` _ = &m.a.x.y // ERROR `cannot take the address of m.a.x.y` _ = &(m.a.x.y) // ERROR `cannot take the address of m.a.x.y` _ = (&m).a.x.y // ERROR `&m.a undefined (type *map[string]interface {} has no field or method a)` %%}
